Quick Facts

EXIT   X

HEALTH AND SAFETY AT WORK

Page

Table of Contents

 

 

There are a number of practical things you can do to eliminate or minimise risks in the workplace.

 

For example, you can:

 

•

develop and implement risk management strategies

•

discuss safety issues on a daily or regular basis

•

comply with any directions and safety information, and make sure others do too

•

report any potential risks in the workplace

•

offer suggestions about what could be done to minimise or eliminate risks
